00025 int SendPacket(MinetHandle &ethermux, MinetHandle &arp, Packet &p)
00026 {
00027 
00028   IPHeader iph = p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00029 
00030   IPAddress ipaddr;
00031 
00032   iph.GetDestIP(ipaddr);
00033 
00034   ARPRequestResponse req(ipaddr,
00035                          EthernetAddr(ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR),
00036                          ARPRequestResponse::REQUEST);
00037   ARPRequestResponse resp;
00038 
00039   MinetSend(arp,req);
00040   MinetReceive(arp,resp);
00041 
00042   if (resp.ethernetaddr!=ETHERNET_BLANK_ADDR) {
00043     resp.flag=ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK;
00044   }
00045 
00046   if ((resp.flag==ARPRequestResponse::RESPONSE_OK) ||
00047       (ipaddr == "255.255.255.255")) {
00048     // set src and dest addrs in header
00049     // set protocol ip
00050 
00051     EthernetHeader h;
00052     h.SetSrcAddr(MyEthernetAddr);
00053     h.SetDestAddr(resp.ethernetaddr);
00054     h.SetProtocolType(PROTO_IP);
00055     p.PushHeader(h);
00056 
00057     RawEthernetPacket e(p);
00058 
00059 #if DEBUG_SEND
00060     cout << "ABOUT TO SEND OUT: " << endl;
00061     Packet check(e);
00062     check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00063     check.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(check));
00064     EthernetHeader eh = check.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00065     IPHeader iph = check.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00066 
00067     eh.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00068     iph.Print(cerr); cerr << endl;
00069     cout << "END OF PACKET" << endl << endl;
00070 #endif
00071 
00072     MinetSend(ethermux,e);
00073     return 0;
00074   } else {
00075     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Discarding packet because there is no arp entry"));
00076     cerr << "Discarded IP packet because there is no arp entry\n";
00077     return -1;
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00082 {
00083   MinetHandle ethermux, ipmux, arp;
00084 
00085   MinetInit(MINET_IP_MODULE);
00086 
00087   ethermux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) ?                          \
00088                         MinetConnect(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00089   arp=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ARP_MODULE) ?                                 \
00090                         MinetConnect(MINET_ARP_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00091   ipmux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ?                                   \
00092                         MinetAccept(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00093 
00094   if (ethermux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00095     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ethermux"));
00096     return -1;
00097   }
00098   if (ipmux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00099     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from ipmux"));
00100     return -1;
00101   }
00102   if (arp==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX)) {
00103     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to arp_module"));
00104     return -1;
00105   }
00106 
00107   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ip_module handling IP traffic........"));
00108 
00109   MinetEvent event;
00110 
00111   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00112     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00113         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00114       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00115     } else {
00116       if (event.handle==ethermux) {
00117         RawEthernetPacket raw;
00118         MinetReceive(ethermux,raw);
00119 
00120         Packet p(raw);
00121         p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00122         p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<IPHeader>(IPHeader::EstimateIPHeaderLength(p));
00123         IPHeader iph;
00124         iph=p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00125 
00126 #if DEBUG_RECV
00127         cerr << "Received Packet: " << endl;
00128         iph.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;  p.Print(cerr);  cerr << endl;
00129 #endif
00130 
00131         IPAddress toip;
00132         iph.GetDestIP(toip);
00133 
00134         if (toip==MyIPAddr || toip==IPAddress(IP_ADDRESS_BROADCAST)) {
00135           if (!(iph.IsChecksumCorrect())) {
00136             // discard the packet
00137             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent                             \
00138                         ("Discarding packet because header checksum is wrong."));
00139             cerr << "Discarding following packet because header checksum is wrong: "<<p<<"\n";
00140 
00141             IPAddress src;  iph.GetSourceIP(src);
00142             // "2" specifies the octet that is wrong (in this case, the checksum)
00143 
00144             ICMPPacket error(src, PARAMETER_PROBLEM, 2, p);
00145 
00146             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ICMP error message has been sent to host"));
00147 
00148             SendPacket(ethermux,arp,error);
00149 
00150             continue;
00151           }
00152           unsigned char ttl;
00153           iph.GetTTL(ttl);
00154           if (ttl==0) {
00155             // discard the packet
00156             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent                             \
00157                         ("Discarding packet because TTL is zero."));
00158             cerr << "Discarding following packet because TTL is zero: "<<p<<"\n";
00159 
00160             IPAddress src;  iph.GetSourceIP(src);
00161             ICMPPacket error(src, TIME_EXCEEDED,TTL_EQUALS_ZERO_DURING_TRANSIT, p);
00162 
00163             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ICMP error message has been sent to host"));
00164 
00165             SendPacket(ethermux,arp,error);
00166 
00167             continue;
00168           }
00169           unsigned short fragoff;
00170           unsigned char flags;
00171           iph.GetFlags(flags);
00172           iph.GetFragOffset(fragoff);
00173           if ((flags&IP_HEADER_FLAG_MOREFRAG) || (fragoff!=0)) {
00174             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent                             \
00175                         ("Discarding packet because it is a fragment"));
00176             cerr << "Discarding following packet because it is a fragment: "<<p<<"\n";
00177 
00178             IPAddress src;  iph.GetSourceIP(src);
00179             ICMPPacket error(src, DESTINATION_UNREACHABLE ,FRAGMENTATION_NEEDED, p);
00180 
00181             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ICMP error message has been sent to host"));
00182 
00183             SendPacket(ethermux,arp,error);
00184 
00185             continue;
00186           }
00187 
00188           // route here - would send icmp dest unreachable if fails
00189 
00190           // unfragment here
00191 
00192           MinetSend(ipmux,p);
00193         } else {
00194           ; // discarded due to different target address
00195         }
00196 
00197       }
00198       if (event.handle==ipmux) {
00199         Packet p;
00200         MinetReceive(ipmux,p);
00201 
00202         // Route Packet Here - would send icmp dest unreachable if fails
00203 
00204         // Fragment Packet Here
00205 
00206         SendPacket(ethermux,arp,p);
00207 
00208       }
00209     }
00210   }
00211   MinetDeinit();
00212   return 0;
00213 }
